title: the Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information set out in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Community Innovation Survey)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Community Innovation Survey) 

Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (community innovation survey) order 2023

title: the Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information set out in
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2019/2152 of the European Parliament and 
of the Council of 27 November 20191, as amended by Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) 2021/1704 of 14 July 20212; 

“survey” means the Community Innovation Survey 2023 that is conducted by 
the Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information set out in 
the Schedule for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires.
text_norm: 2 (1) order - regulation mean regulation (eu) 2019 2152 european parliament council 27 november 20191 amended commission delegated regulation (eu) 2021 1704 14 july 20212 survey mean community innovation survey 2023 conducted central statistic office purpose obtaining information set schedule purpose compliance regulation (2) word expression used order also used regulation meaning order regulation except context otherwise requires

title: the Central Statistics Office for the purposes of obtaining information set out in
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that –
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that – 

(a) 

(b) 

engages 10 or more persons, and 

is classified for statistical purposes under section B, C, D, E, G, 
H, J, K or M of NACE Rev. 2, as set out in Annex I to Regulation 
(EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 20 December 20063, as amended by Regulation (EC) 
No. 295/2008 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 
11 March 20084, Regulation (EU) No. 70/2012 of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 20125 and Regulation 
(EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 20 June 20196. 

1 OJ No. L 327, 17.12.2019, p. 1 
2 OJ No. L 339, 24.9.2021, p. 33 
3 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p. 1 
4 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p. 13 
5 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p. 1 
6 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p. 241 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies to provide, 
once only and for the purposes of the survey, information the general nature of 
which is specified in the Schedule is hereby prescribed. 

[223] 3 

 
 
 
 4 [223]
